|rad1chip2 = RFMD;RF2959; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "PW27402VGOXXX10 Made In Taiwan" is silkscreened on the main board (appears to be a Billion 7402VGO). "P05-6855A100" is silkscreened on the wireless module. There is no FCC ID printed on the label. The FCC ID of the wireless module has been assigned to the device. ==Serial logs== ===Boot=== 
PP Boot 5.00a (07 June 2004)
Copyright (c) 2004 Conexant Systems Ltd.
SDRAM size = 0x1000000
PLL indicates clock speed set to maximum value of 96MHz
MAC 0:a0:c0:0:72:ac
NP
zlib 100%
Allocatable memory starts @ 0x5f3900, end @ 0x1000000
No, or invalid, configuration information in EEPROM - trying FLASH
Valid configuration (size 256)
DSL gateway version 5.03 (24 July 2005)
BSP: ADSL-A/2/G v1.00
CSP: Argon 4x2 CSP v1.0 (ISOS 9.0)
CPU: Argon 432 (0x34325247 "GR24")
Copyright (c) 2004 Conexant Systems Ltd.
Argon ChipID=34325247 with Crypto Engine
Starting IKE Task (ATMOS Version 1.3)

NP software version is 0x00000900 (reply took 6us)
SNMP Research SNMP Agent Resident Module Version 15.3.1.7
Copyright 1989, 1990, 1991, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001 SNMP Research, Inc.

Restoring from factory configuration ... Success



Login:
